inputs.remark:
V1: Missing DR (Dichotic Rhyme).
V2: Missing speech audiometry.

logic_summary: Added Dichotic Rhyme (Normal) to V1 Central Auditory Processing Battery results. The test appears in the graph (DR*) but is not listed among the deficits in the text, implying normal performance.
Added Speech audiometry to V2 tests as the text states speech recognition scores were essentially unchanged (normal) after abscess resolution.

patch_ops.value: Marked LE deficits on SSW (~20%), Dichotic Digits (0%), NU#20 (0%), and LPFS (~40%). Bilateral deficit on Frequency Patterns (0%). Dichotic Rhyme (Normal).

value.name: Speech audiometry
value.result_summary: Essentially unchanged; normal speech recognition scores.
